properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 16, DNC 17.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ
IN 36-26.4N 063-03.5W AT 122128Z DEC.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
PHONE: 757 398 6231,
FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
